title: Advanced Notification System
description: Advanced, identity-aware notification routing and delivery for Home Assistant.

system_settings.title: System Settings
system_settings.description: Configure global settings for the Advanced Notification System (rate limits, retries and enabled channels).

data.rate_limit_max: Global rate limit (max notifications per window)

default_identity_basic_settings.title: Default Identity — Basic Settings
default_identity_basic_settings.description: Default per-identity settings used when creating new identities (rate limit, retry attempts, notification types, blocked sources).

default_identity_channel_mapping.title: Default Identity — Channel Mapping
default_identity_channel_mapping.description: Map notification criticality levels to default delivery channels for identities.

default_identity_dnd_settings.title: Default Identity — Do Not Disturb (DND)
default_identity_dnd_settings.description: Default Do Not Disturb settings for identities. You can allow exceptions by source pattern.

auto_ha_user_configuration.title: Auto-configure Home Assistant Users
auto_ha_user_configuration.description: Select Home Assistant users to automatically create ANS identities for.

identity_selection.title: Identity Selection
identity_selection.description: Choose an existing Home Assistant user or create a custom identity.

identity_channel_mapping.title: Identity — Channel Mapping
identity_channel_mapping.description: Choose channels for each criticality level for this identity.

identity_dnd_settings.title: Identity — Do Not Disturb (DND)
identity_dnd_settings.description: Configure DND for this identity; use allowed-source patterns to exempt some sources.
